hero.eyebrow: The Gulf's Private Founder & Investor Network
hero.headline:
Build in the Gulf.
Wired to
the World.
hero.sub: One platform. Every program, grant, free zone, accelerator, and investor across six GCC countries ‚Äî AI-powered, free for founders, built from inside the Gulf.

founder.label: Why MFC Exists
founder.quote: "I built and failed in the UK. I arrived in Riyadh in 2022 ‚Äî and saw everything that was missing."
founder.body1: Laws changing weekly. No single source of truth. Founders arriving with genuine ambition but zero map. And almost no women in the room.
founder.body2: After building ventures in the UK ‚Äî including ones that failed ‚Äî Katerina Hayes landed in Saudi Arabia and saw the gap clearly. Founders were stuck. International companies were lost. Everyone needed a trusted, verified, always-on intelligence layer for the Gulf.
founder.body3: MFC is the platform she wished existed. Not a directory. Not a matchmaker. The operating system for Gulf founders ‚Äî free to use, impossible to replace.
founder.name: Katerina Hayes
founder.title: Founder & CEO, MyFounders.Club ¬∑ Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
founder.card_sub: The room that matters. Built in the Gulf. Wired to the world.

problems.headline:
The Gulf has the capital.
Founders just can't find the door.

items.title: Fragmented Intelligence
items.desc: 400+ accelerators, grants, and programs across six countries ‚Äî each with different rules, deadlines, and eligibility. No single source of truth.

items.title: Laws That Move Fast
items.desc: Saudi Arabia fundamentally changed its business regulations in 2025. Most founders are still acting on outdated information.

items.title: No Map for Entry
items.desc: International startups spend months trying to understand which free zone, which jurisdiction, which bank ‚Äî without a trusted guide.

items.title: Wrong Rooms
items.desc: Founders attend the wrong events, apply to mismatched accelerators, and cold-pitch investors who will never fund their stage or sector.

items.title: Isolation at Scale
items.desc: 80% of MENA founders report building alone. Isolated founders are 50% more likely to delay critical business decisions.

items.title: The Diversity Gap
items.desc: Female-led Gulf startups raised just $17.6M in H1 2025. The community infrastructure to change this simply didn't exist ‚Äî until now.

audience.headline:
The right room
for the right builder.

gulf.h:
Local roots.
Regional scale.
Global ambition.
gulf.body: You're building something real in the Gulf. MFC gives you one platform to find the right program, apply to the right grant, and match with the right investor ‚Äî and connect with founders who are a week ahead of where you are.

features.text: ‚Äî one clear next move, not 300 options
‚Äî Hub71, Misk, Flat6Labs, Monsha'at, and 400+ more
‚Äî warm introductions matched by stage, sector, and thesis
‚Äî pitch to 30+ curated investors in one room
‚Äî ecosystem trips to London, Helsinki, Tokyo, San Francisco

cards.title: AI Next-Step Engine
cards.desc: Tell us your stage and sector. Get your one clear next step ‚Äî instantly, free.

cards.title: Grant & Program Matcher
cards.desc: AI scans 400+ GCC programs and ranks them by your profile. Stop missing deadlines.

cards.title: Investor Matching
cards.desc: Warm introductions to investors already aligned with your stage, sector, and geography.

cards.title: Global Expansion Corridors
cards.desc: Once you've built locally ‚Äî MFC connects you to the world's key startup hubs.

intl.h:
Expanding to
the Gulf? Skip
the two-year cold start.
intl.body: Six countries. Six legal frameworks. Dozens of free zones. MFC navigates the complexity so you enter the Gulf as an insider ‚Äî not a tourist.

features.text: ‚Äî compare free zones, licensing, and incentives across UAE, KSA, Qatar, Bahrain, Oman, Kuwait
‚Äî ADGM, DMCC, DIFC, Dubai Silicon Oasis ‚Äî ranked by your fit
‚Äî vetted local legal, finance, HR, and logistics partners
‚Äî founders who've done your exact entry journey
‚Äî pre-screened for your stage and sector
‚Äî live updates when Gulf laws change (they do, often)

cards.title: Gulf Entry Navigator
cards.desc: Compare all 6 GCC countries. Get a recommended launch stack: zone + bank + program.

cards.title: Regulatory Intelligence
cards.desc: Real-time updates on licensing, visa rules, and free zone changes ‚Äî before they trip you up.

cards.title: Trusted Supplier Network
cards.desc: Vetted legal, banking, and operational partners. No more cold searches.

cards.title: Local Founder Community
cards.desc: Connect with founders who landed before you ‚Äî and open the doors they know.

inv.h:
Signal before
noise. See deals
before the market.
inv.body: 3,027 investors participated in GCC funding rounds in 2025. MFC gives you AI-scored deal flow from a living community ‚Äî not just self-reported pitch decks.

features.text: ‚Äî ranked by community engagement, milestones, and peer validation
‚Äî private deal rooms and co-investment coordination
‚Äî pre-compiled profiles, market data, competitive intel
‚Äî 12-person curated evenings. Real conversation, no decks.
‚Äî quarterly deep dives on GCC capital flows
‚Äî first look at the Gulf's most prepared founders

cards.title: AI-Scored Deal Flow
cards.desc: See which founders are actually building ‚Äî not just pitching.

cards.title: Private Deal Rooms
cards.desc: Co-invest with investors who've already done the first layer of due diligence.

cards.title: Due Diligence Packs

cards.title: Gulf Startup Pulse

how.headline:
One platform.
One clear next step.

steps.title: Build Your Profile
steps.desc: 5 questions. Stage, sector, geography, funding status, and goal. Under two minutes. Instantly useful.

steps.title: Get Your Next Step
steps.desc: The AI engine scans every GCC program, grant, investor, and free zone ‚Äî and gives you one clear recommendation.

steps.title: Connect & Apply
steps.desc: Match with the right accelerator, apply to the right grant, get a warm introduction to the right investor ‚Äî all inside the platform.

steps.title: Scale With the Room
steps.desc: Join masterminds, attend events, go on ecosystem trips. Your next step updates automatically as your milestones evolve.

beta.headline:
Get early access.
Build with us.
beta.sub: We're opening the platform to a first cohort of Gulf founders and international companies expanding to the Gulf. Free. No credit card. Just signal.
